HR.name: hrRole
HR.label: What do you know about the role of HR?
HR.placeholder: Explain your understanding of HR responsibilities...

HR.name: hrDifference
HR.label: What makes you different from other applicants for the HR team?
HR.placeholder: Highlight what makes you unique for this role...

HR.name: hrCommitment
HR.label: How many hours per week can you commit to HR work?

HR.name: hrGoogleTools
HR.label: Have you ever used any Google tools before (Google Sheets, Forms, Meet)?
HR.placeholder: Mention which tools you've used and your experience...

HR.name: hrSoftSkills
HR.label: What soft skills do you consider your strongest?

HR.name: hrStrength
HR.label: What is your main strength that you think will be useful in HR?
HR.placeholder: Describe your key strength relevant to HR...

HR.name: hrWeakness
HR.label: What is your main weakness that might affect your work, and how do you deal with it?
HR.placeholder: Explain your weakness and coping strategies...

HR.name: hrDeadline
HR.label: When you have a task with a tight deadline, how do you usually manage it?
HR.placeholder: Describe your approach to managing tight deadlines...

HR.name: hrWillingToLearn
HR.label: Are you willing to learn new things if needed?

HR.name: hrProblemSolving
HR.label: When you face a problem or time pressure, do you prefer to solve it alone or ask for help?
HR.placeholder: Explain how you handle problems under pressure...

HR.name: hrUnknownTask
HR.label: If you are assigned a task and you don’t know the tool or method to complete it, what would you do?
HR.placeholder: Explain your approach to unfamiliar tasks...

Logistics.name: logWhyJoin

Logistics.label: How would you describe your communication style?

Logistics.name: logOnSite

Logistics.placeholder: Describe your key strength for Logistics...

Logistics.placeholder: Share skills you want to learn or improve...

Media.name: mediaDesignProcess
Media.label: Where do you usually start your design process? (sketches, colors, references…etc.)
Media.placeholder: Describe your starting point in the design process...

Media.name: mediaColorsFonts
Media.label: How do you choose colors and fonts to match the target audience?
Media.placeholder: Explain your method for selecting colors and fonts...

Media.name: mediaBadDesignExample
Media.label: Give an example of a famous design you don’t like, and tell us how you’d improve it.
Media.placeholder: Provide an example and improvement suggestions...

Media.name: mediaFeedbackResponse
Media.label: If you received vague feedback like “the design is weak,” how would you respond?
Media.placeholder: Explain your response to unclear feedback...

Media.name: mediaFavoriteDesigns
Media.label: Which type of designs do you enjoy the most: social media posts, logos, posters? Why?
Media.placeholder: Share your favorite design types and reasons...

Media.name: mediaBrandingExperience
Media.label: Do you have experience with branding guidelines? (If yes, explain.)
Media.placeholder: Describe any experience with branding rules...

Media.name: mediaRevisions
Media.label: How do you handle receiving too many revisions from the team?
Media.placeholder: Explain your approach to multiple revisions...

Media.name: mediaPortfolioLink
Media.label: Share a link or image of a design you’re really proud of.
Media.placeholder: Provide a URL or upload your best work...

Media.name: mediaTools
Media.label: Which design tools do you usually use? (e.g., Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma, Canva, others…)
Media.placeholder: List the design tools you use...

VideoEditing.name: videoRevisions

VideoEditing.placeholder: Explain how you manage multiple revisions...

VideoEditing.name: videoFavoriteType

VideoEditing.name: videoBrandingExperience

VideoEditing.name: videoProblemSolving

VideoEditing.name: videoCreativeInspiration

Marketing.name: mktWhyJoin
Marketing.label: Why did you choose to join the Marketing team and not another team?

Marketing.name: mktPlatform
Marketing.label: Which social media platform do you think is best for reaching university students, and why?
Marketing.placeholder: Share your preferred platform and reasoning...

Marketing.name: mktEngagement
Marketing.label: If people are not engaging with our posts, what could be the reason?
Marketing.placeholder: Explain possible causes for low engagement...

Marketing.name: mktNegative
Marketing.label: If someone writes a negative comment on our post, how would you respond?

Marketing.name: mktProject

Marketing.name: mktTrend
Marketing.label: If there is a trend, how would you use it without copying others?
Marketing.placeholder: Explain your approach to trends creatively...

Marketing.name: mktExtraWork
Marketing.label: If we need you to work extra hard a day before an event, what would you do?
Marketing.placeholder: Explain how you would handle extra work...

Marketing.name: mktTools
Marketing.label: Have you ever used tools like Canva or Photoshop, or made a quick story video?
Marketing.placeholder: List tools you've used and experience...

Marketing.name: mktFeedback
Marketing.label: How do you accept feedback if your idea is not suitable?

Marketing.name: mktCaption

Marketing.placeholder: Write a creative caption for the images...

Marketing.name: mktImpact
Marketing.label: How would you like to leave your mark on the Marketing team after the season ends?
Marketing.placeholder: Explain your desired impact in the team...

EventManagement.name: eventTimePressure

EventManagement.name: eventTeamwork

EventManagement.placeholder: Describe your plan for short-prep events...

EventManagement.name: eventMotivation
EventManagement.label: What keeps you going when something is difficult? Or do you decide it’s not worth the effort if it feels too hard?

EventManagement.name: eventAchievement
EventManagement.label: Tell me about a moment when you felt you achieved a small accomplishment that made a big difference and taught you something new.

EventManagement.name: eventMistake
EventManagement.label: If you make a mistake in your work, what’s the best decision you take to fix it?

EventManagement.name: eventConflict

EventManagement.name: eventQuickLearn

EventManagement.placeholder: Explain how you quickly learned a new skill...

FR.placeholder: Explain how you handle sponsor conditions...

FR.name: frCompareSponsors

FR.name: frSpecializedSponsor
